title: Well Preserved
content:
Hey all need an ID on the typefaces used on these jars. Mainly after the brand name 'Palette' but the secondary type would be helpful too. Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416054940im_/http:/typophile.com/files/palette_5814.jpg)
author: Fostergrant

comments.content:
_after the brand name ’Palette’_

You mean the script font? It could be [Carpenter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416054940/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/carpenter/).
I think he means he's mostly looking for 'Palette"
closest match I can find for "Palette" is [Attrament](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416054940/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/atrament/std-light/)

I think Agostini's right. The shape of the p counter looks like a better match, and the t has less of a tail, like the sample. [Univers Ultra Condensed Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416054940/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/univers/)

- Mike Yanega
Yeah, I think you guys are right.

Thanks everyone, type ninjas in the house.

Cheers
